newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish bourse kerb bond deals - August 21.
newsitem.headline: Polish bourse kerb bond deals - August 21.

text.p: Turnover in kerb bond deals through the Warsaw bourse was 216.3 million zlotys on Wednesday up from Tuesday's 1.2 million zlotys.
Here is a summary of block transactions made on the Warsaw Stock Exchange:
* 105,181 fixed-interest five-year bonds maturing on October 12, 2000 traded at 90.50.
* 26,355 fixed-interest five-year bonds maturing on October 12, 2000 traded at 90.45.
* 31,473 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on February 7, 1998 traded at 103.70. @
* 6,060 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 9, 1997 traded at 103.50.
* 423,064 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 6, 1998 traded at 104.10.
* 325,332 variable-interest three-year bonds maturing on November 6, 1998 traded at 104.20.
